name: A Familiar Potion
description:
This is my entry for Bevy Jam #2

Note: the game might take a few seconds before appearing on screen. Please be patient.

You're a witch. Combine ingredients, make potions, and test them on yourself or on your familiar to discover their effects! Your familiar is fetching the ingredients for you, so try to increase its capabilities without hurting him.

If you're stuck or don't want to spend time experimenting, you can use the potion guide.

This is my first project in Rust, and my first project with the Bevy engine. The source code is available on GitLab.
